hadiths.text: Narrated from Abi Sukainah One of the Companions: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Let the Abyssinians alone as long as they let you alone, and let the Turks alone as long as they leave you alone

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي النَّهْىِ عَنْ تَهْيِيجِ التُّرْكِ، وَالْحَبَشَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition Of Agitating The Turks And Abyssinians
